trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bruker en annen mal avhengig modus for elementet startes og innstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The InstantiateItemTemplate method uses one of the following templates to populate the container: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> > [!NOTE] > This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InstantiateItemTemplate bruker en av følgende maler for å fylle ut beholderen:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>> [!NOTE] > denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The container that is used to store the child controls.
trans-unit.target: Beholderen som brukes til å lagre underordnede-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The display index of the item that is being instantiated.
trans-unit.target: Vis indeksen for elementet som er startes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control does not have an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate*> template specified.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen ikke har en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate*>mal angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether model binding is in use.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om modellen bindingen er i bruk.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if model binding is in use, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis modellen bindingen er i bruk, ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cancel operation is requested, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control cancels the insert or edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en Avbryt-operasjonen forespørres, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen avbryter innsettingen eller Rediger operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the ItemCanceling event when a Cancel button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control cancels the insert or edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen opphøyer ItemCanceling-hendelse når en Avbryt-knappen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>malen klikkes, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen avbryter innsettingen eller Rediger operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (A Cancel button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Cancel".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state.
trans-unit.target: (En Avbryt-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Avbryt".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel stopper Avbryt-operasjonen hvis den gjør elementet uønsket tilstand.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCancelEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCancelEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne indeksen for elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It also lets you indicate that the cancel operation should be stopped.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi at Avbryt-operasjonen skal stoppes.

trans-unit.source: To stop the operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCancelEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil stoppe operasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCancelEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The ItemCommand event is raised when a button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: ItemCommand denne hendelsen oppstår når en knapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: Buttons in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can also invoke built-in functionality of the control.
trans-unit.target: Knappene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll kan også starte innebygd funksjonalitet kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists values that you can use with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property of a button in order to invoke built-in functionality.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser verdier som du kan bruke med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>-egenskapen til en knapp for å aktivere innebygd funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: |CommandName value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |"Cancel"|Cancels an edit or insert operation.
trans-unit.target: | Verdien for kommandonavn | Beskrivelse | |-----------------------|-----------------| |" Avbryt "| Avbryter en Rediger eller insert-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> event.| |"Delete"|Deletes the current record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Viser <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling>-hendelsen. | |" Slett "| Sletter gjeldende post fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> events.| |"Select"|Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> property value for the item.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>hendelser. | |" Velg "| Angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>egenskapsverdien for elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A> template for the item.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>malen for elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged> events.| |"Edit"|Puts the item in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>hendelser. | |" Rediger "| Settes elementet i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template for the item.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>malen for elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> event.| |"Insert"|Inserts the bound values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template into the data source.
trans-unit.target: Viser <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing>-hendelsen. | |" Sett inn "| Setter inn bundne verdiene fra det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>malen til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> events.| |"Update"|Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>hendelser. | |" Oppdateringen "| Oppdaterer gjeldende oppføring i datakilden med bundne verdier fra det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>malen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated> events.| |"Sort"|Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated>hendelser. | |" Sorter "| Sorterer oppført i den `CommandArgument` -egenskapen for knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted> events.| The ItemCommand event is also raised when a button that is listed in the previous table is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted>hendelser. | ItemCommand denne hendelsen oppstår også når brukeren klikker en knapp som er oppført i tabellen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>

trans-unit.source: However, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table.
trans-unit.target: Men anbefales det at du bruker hendelser som er oppført i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The ItemCommand event is usually used to handle custom operations.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen ItemCommand brukes vanligvis til å håndtere egendefinerte operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the command name and command argument of the button that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne kommandonavnet og kommando-argument for knappen som ble klikket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå kommandonavnet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To determine the command argument, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne Kommandoargumentet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To access the control that raised the event, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til kontrollen som hendelsen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is created in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppstår når et element som er opprettet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object must be created for each item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen, kan gjengis, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>objekt må opprettes for hvert element i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The ItemCreated event is raised when each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: ItemCreated denne hendelsen oppstår når hvert enkelt element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as adding custom content to an item.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel å legge til innhold i et element.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to access the properties of the item that is being created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan få tilgang til egenskapene for elementet som opprettes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To access a specific control in the item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: For å få tilgang til en bestemt kontroll i elementet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>objektet som ligger i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can determine which item type (data item, insert item, empty item) is being created by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fastslå hvilke elementet type (dataelement, Sett inn element tomt element) opprettes ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a data item is bound to data in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et dataelement er bundet til data i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be rendered, each item in the control must be bound to a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen, kan gjengis, hvert element i kontrollen må være bundet til en oppføring i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The ItemDataBound event is raised when a data item is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: ItemDataBound denne hendelsen oppstår når et dataelement er bundet til data i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (Data items are represented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem> objects.) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as modifying the values of the data that is bound to the item.
trans-unit.target: (Dataelementer representeres av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>objekter.)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel å endre verdiene for dataene som er bundet til elementet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to access the properties of the item that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan få tilgang til egenskapene for elementet som er bundet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To access a specific control in the item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: For å få tilgang til en bestemt kontroll i elementet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>objektet som ligger i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can determine which item type (data item, insert item, empty item) is being bound by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fastslå hvilke elementet type (dataelement, Sett inn element tomt element) er blir bundet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a delete operation is requested, after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en sletting forespørres, når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen sletter elementet.

trans-unit.source: The ItemDeleted event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: ItemDeleted denne hendelsen oppstår når et element Delete-knappen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>-metoden, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen lastes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Delete-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Delete".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel kontroll resultatene av sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of rows that were affected in the data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, som gjør det mulig å finne ut hvor mange rader som er berørt i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også finne ut hvilke unntak kan ha oppstått.

trans-unit.source: You can indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi om unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a delete operation is requested, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en sletting forespørres, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen sletter elementet.

trans-unit.source: The ItemDeleting event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: ItemDeleting denne hendelsen oppstår når et element Delete-knappen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>-metoden, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen lastes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Delete-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Delete".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel avbryter sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne indeksen for gjeldende element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It also lets you indicate that the delete operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi at sletteoperasjonen bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the delete operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte sletteoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> collections before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også arbeide med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>samlinger før verdiene er sendt til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an edit operation is requested, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> item is put in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en redigeringsoperasjonen forespørres, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> elementet plasseres i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The ItemEditing event is raised when an item's Edit button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> item is put in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: ItemEditing-hendelsen oppstår når et element Rediger-knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>elementet plasseres i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (An Edit button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Edit".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the edit operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Rediger-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Edit".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel avbryter redigeringsoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewEditEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewEditEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne indeksen for gjeldende element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewEditEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It also lets you indicate that the edit operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi at redigeringsoperasjonen bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the edit operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewEditEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte redigeringsoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewEditEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewEditEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an insert operation is requested, after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control has inserted the item in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en insert-operasjonen forespørres, når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen er inn elementet i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the ItemInserted event when an Insert button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control inserts the item in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen opphøyer ItemInserted-hendelse når en Insert-knappen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>malen klikkes eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A>-metoden, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen setter inn elementet i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (An Insert button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Insert-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Insert".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel kontrollere resultatet av en insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of records affected.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen som gjør det mulig å bestemme antall poster som blir påvirket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også finne ut hvilke unntak kan ha oppstått.

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records that were affected by the insert operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå antall poster som er berørt av innsetting av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå om unntak oppstod i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to access the values of the inserted record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til verdiene for innsatte oppføringen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property reports that no items were inserted, you can rebind the insert values to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>egenskapen rapporterer at ingen elementer ble satt inn, kan du binde insert-verdiene som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>malen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an insert operation is requested, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control performs the insert.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en insert-operasjonen forespørres, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen utfører innsetting.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the ItemInserting event when an Insert button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen opphøyer ItemInserting-hendelse når en Insert-knappen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>malen klikkes eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A>-metoden, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen setter inn oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (An Insert button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as HTML-encoding the values of a record before it is inserted in the data source.
trans-unit.target: (En Insert-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Insert".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel HTML-koding verdiene i en post før den er satt inn i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, som gjør det mulig å bestemme verdien for en valgfri Kommandoargumentet som er sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It also lets you indicate that the insert operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi at innsettingsoperasjonen bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the insert operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte innsettingen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can read or modify the field values for the new record by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lese eller endre feltverdiene for den nye posten ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID for the item placeholder in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir IDen for plassholderen element i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemPlaceholderID property to specify an ID for the item placeholder.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ItemPlaceholderID-egenskapen til å angi en ID for plassholderen elementet.

trans-unit.source: The item placeholder is the control that you add to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> template (if you are not using groups) or to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A> template (if you are using groups) to represent where the item will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Elementet plassholderen er kontrollen du legger til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>malen (Hvis du ikke bruker grupper) eller til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A>mal (Hvis du bruker grupper) representerer hvor elementet skal gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ID for the item placeholder in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: IDen for plassholderen element i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is "itemPlaceholder".
trans-unit.target: Standarden er "itemPlaceholder".

trans-unit.source: The specified ID is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte IDen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> eller en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem"></xref> objects that represent the data items of the current page of data in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem"> </xref> objekter som representerer dataelementer for gjeldende side med data i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Items property is used to store the data items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen elementer som brukes til å lagre dataelementene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control automatically populates the Items collection by creating one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem> object for each record in the current page of data in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen fyller automatisk elementsamlingen ved å opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>objekt for hver oppføring på gjeldende side med data i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It then adds each object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvert objekt legges deretter til i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This property is usually used to access a specific item in the control or to iterate though the complete collection of items.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å få tilgang til et spesifikt element i kontrollen eller gå gjennom hele samlingen av elementer.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains all the data items of the current page of data in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder alle dataelementer for gjeldende side med data i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the separator between the items in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det egendefinerte innholdet for skille mellom elementene i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemSeparatorTemplate property to define the contents of the separator between single items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ItemSeparatorTemplate-egenskapen til å definere innholdet for skille mellom enkeltelementer av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The ItemSeparatorTemplate is displayed after every item except the last one.
trans-unit.target: ItemSeparatorTemplate vises etter hvert element bortsett fra den siste.

trans-unit.source: To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `ItemSeparatorTemplate` element inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi den egendefinerte malen deklarativt, kan du legge til en `ItemSeparatorTemplate` elementet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can then add the contents of the template to the `ItemSeparatorTemplate` element.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter legge til innholdet i malen som skal den `ItemSeparatorTemplate` elementet.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the custom content for the separator between the items of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder egendefinerte innholdet for skille mellom elementene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the data item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egendefinerte innholdet for dataelementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemTemplate property to define a custom user interface (UI) to display the data items.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Elementmalen-egenskapen til å definere en egendefinert brukergrensesnittet (UI) for å vise dataelementene.

trans-unit.source: The ItemTemplate template is required by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Malen Elementmalen kreves av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It usually contains controls to display the field values of a record.
trans-unit.target: Den inneholder vanligvis kontroller for å vise feltverdiene fra en post.

trans-unit.source: If you want to let users modify the data, you also usually add buttons to the ItemTemplate template that let the user select a record, switch to edit mode, or delete a record.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at brukere endre dataene, legger du også vanligvis knapper til Elementmalen-malen som brukeren velger en post, bytter til redigeringsmodus eller slette en oppføring.

trans-unit.source: To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `ItemTemplate` element inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi den egendefinerte malen deklarativt, kan du legge til en `ItemTemplate` elementet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can then add the contents of the template to the `ItemTemplate` element.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter legge til innholdet i malen som skal den `ItemTemplate` elementet.

trans-unit.source: To display the field values of the data source that is bound to the control, use a data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise feltverdiene fra datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen, bruker du databinding uttrykk.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [databinding uttrykk oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To create buttons that perform the built-in select, delete, and edit operations, add a button control to the template.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette knapper som utfører innebygde Velg, delete- og rediger operasjoner, Legg til en knappekontrollen malen.

trans-unit.source: Set its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property to one of the values listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>egenskapen til en av verdiene som vises i følgende tabell.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Button type|CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |Delete|"Delete"| |Edit|"Edit"| |Select|"Select"|
trans-unit.target: | Knappen typen | Verdien for kommandonavn | |-----------------|-----------------------| | Slett | " Slett "| | Rediger | " Rediger "| | Velg | " Velg "|

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the custom content for the data item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder egendefinerte innholdet for dataelementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an update operation is requested, after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control updates the item.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en oppdateringsoperasjon forespørres, når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen oppdaterer elementet.

trans-unit.source: The ItemUpdated event is raised when an item's Update button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control updates the item.
trans-unit.target: ItemUpdated denne hendelsen oppstår når et element oppdateringsknappen klikkes eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A>-metoden, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen oppdaterer elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: (An Update button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Update".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of the update operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Oppdater-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Oppdatering".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel kontroll resultatene av oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen som gjør det mulig å finne ut hvor mange berørt av rader.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også finne ut hvilke unntak kan ha oppstått.

trans-unit.source: You can indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi om unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an update operation is requested, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control updates the item.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en oppdateringsoperasjon forespørres, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen oppdaterer elementet.

trans-unit.source: The ItemUpdating event is raised when an item's Update button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control updates the item.
trans-unit.target: ItemUpdating denne hendelsen oppstår når et element oppdateringsknappen klikkes eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A>-metoden, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen oppdaterer elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: (An Update button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Update".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the update operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Oppdater-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Oppdatering".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel avbryte oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne indeksen for gjeldende element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It also lets you indicate that the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi at oppdateringen bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte oppdateringen, kan du angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Du kan jobbe med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>samlinger før verdiene er sendt til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: A typical way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Vanlig måte å bruke disse samlingene som HTML-kode verdiene som er oppgitt av brukeren før de er lagret i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This helps prevent script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: Dette hindrer skript innsetting angrep.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate*> template is created in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate*>opprettes i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> template must be created to serve as the root container for the control.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen, kan gjengis, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>malen må opprettes for å betjene som root-beholder for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutCreated event is raised when the layout template in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: LayoutCreated denne hendelsen oppstår når malen oppsettet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the root container in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det egendefinerte innholdet for root-beholder i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the LayoutTemplate property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the root container of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk LayoutTemplate-egenskapen til å definere en egendefinert brukergrensesnittet (UI) for beholderen roten av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To specify the layout template, add a `LayoutTemplate` element inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi oppsettet malen, kan du legge til en `LayoutTemplate` elementet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can then add the contents of the template to the `LayoutTemplate` element.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter legge til innholdet i malen som skal den `LayoutTemplate` elementet.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutTemplate content must include a placeholder control such as a table row (`tr`) element for the items that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> template or for groups that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: LayoutTemplate innholdet må inkludere en Plassholderkontroll som en tabell (`tr`)-element for elementer som er definert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>malen eller grupper som er definert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A>malen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The placeholder control must have the `runat` attribute set to "server" and the `ID` attribute set to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemPlaceholderID%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupPlaceholderID%2A> property, depending on whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is using groups.
trans-unit.target: Plassholder-kontrollen må ha den `runat` attributtet satt til "server" og `ID` attributtet angis som verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemPlaceholderID%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupPlaceholderID%2A>egenskapen, avhengig av om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen bruker grupper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupPlaceholderID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemPlaceholderID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutTemplate template is not required by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Malen LayoutTemplate kreves ikke av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control without a LayoutTemplate and also without a placeholder server control with a known ID.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen uten en LayoutTemplate og også en plassholder serverkontroll med en kjent ID.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the custom content for the root container in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder egendefinerte innholdet for root-beholder i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the properties in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control that must be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tilstanden egenskapene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen må være fast, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved control state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder lagrede kontrollverdiene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tidligere lagret visningsstatusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan imidlertid overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil angi hvordan en egendefinert serverkontroll gjenoppretter visningstilstanden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder lagrede visningen verdiene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of items to display on a single page of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter maksimalt antall elementer som skal vises på én side av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> object is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control, the MaximumRows property value is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> object, and it is same as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>objekt er knyttet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll, egenskapsverdien MaximumRows kontrolleres av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>objekt, og er den samme som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the value is -1.
trans-unit.target: Ellers er verdien -1.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items to display on a single page of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall elementer som skal vises på én side av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control should be handled.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en hendelse for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen skal behandles.

trans-unit.source: The OnBubbleEvent method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to optionally handle events that are passed up through the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnBubbleEvent brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen skal håndtere eventuelt hendelser som er sendt til kontrollen hierarkiet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It determines whether to handle an event by examining the properties of the <xref:System.EventArgs> object that are contained in the `e` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den bestemmer om å behandle en hendelse ved å kontrollere egenskapene for den <xref:System.EventArgs>objektet som finnes i den `e` parameteren.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When an event must be handled, the method performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Metoden utfører de nødvendige handlingene når en hendelse må behandles.

trans-unit.source: Other events are ignored and passed up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Andre hendelser ignoreres og sendt kontroll-hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: The return value of this method indicates whether to handle the event or to pass the event up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av denne metoden angir om å behandle hendelsen eller sende hendelsen kontroll-hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control overrides the base implementation of this method to perform the appropriate action when one of the buttons that is recognized by the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen overstyrer base implementeringen av denne metoden til å utføre de nødvendige handlingene når en av knappene gjenkjennes kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the buttons that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser knappene som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen gjenkjenner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: |CommandName value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |"Cancel"|Cancels an edit or insert operation.
trans-unit.target: | Verdien for kommandonavn | Beskrivelse | |-----------------------|-----------------| |" Avbryt "| Avbryter en Rediger eller insert-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> event.| |"Delete"|Deletes the current record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Viser <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling>-hendelsen. | |" Slett "| Sletter gjeldende post fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> events.| |"Select"|Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> property value for the item.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>hendelser. | |" Velg "| Angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>egenskapsverdien for elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A> template for the item.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>malen for elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged> events.| |"Edit"|Puts the item in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>hendelser. | |" Rediger "| Settes elementet i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template for the item.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>malen for elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> event.| |"Insert"|Inserts the bound values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template into the data source.
trans-unit.target: Viser <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing>-hendelsen. | |" Sett inn "| Setter inn bundne verdiene fra det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>malen til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> events.| |"Update"|Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>hendelser. | |" Oppdateringen "| Oppdaterer gjeldende oppføring i datakilden med bundne verdier fra det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>malen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated> events.| |"Sort"|Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated>hendelser. | |" Sorter "| Sorterer oppført i den `CommandArgument` -egenskapen for knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted> events.| This version of the method returns `true` if one of these buttons raises an event that is handled by the control.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted>hendelser. | Denne versjonen av metoden returnerer `true` Hvis en av disse knappene opphøyer en hendelse som behandles av kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>
