trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event should be handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis hendelsen skal behandles; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: Når varslet av denne metoden, må server webkontroller utføre initialisering trinn som kreves for å opprette og konfigurere en forekomst.

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has not yet been populated.
trans-unit.target: I denne fasen av server kontrollens levetid er kontrollens visningsstatus ikke ennå fylt ut.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent of this control.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du tilgang til andre serverkontroller når denne metoden kalles, uavhengig om det er en underordnet eller overordnet for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: Andre serverkontroller garanteres ikke opprettet og for tilgang til.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnInit kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> event when a Cancel button in the control is clicked, but before exiting insert or edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling>-hendelse når en Avbryt-knappen i kontrollen klikkes, men før du avslutter insert eller redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (A Cancel button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Cancel".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state.
trans-unit.target: (En Avbryt-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Avbryt".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel stopper Avbryt-operasjonen hvis den gjør elementet uønsket tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The OnItemCanceling method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnItemCanceling kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen opphøye den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It is typically used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> class.
trans-unit.target: Den brukes av kontrollutviklere når utvider <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: There is no handler for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button in an item template is clicked, but before the command is executed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en knapp i en element-mal, men før kommandoen er utført.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine in response to the supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> value whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør det mulig å utføre en egendefinert rutine som svar på den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>verdi når denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnItemCommand method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnItemCommand kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen opphøye den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object must be created for each item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen, kan gjengis, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>objekt må opprettes for hvert element i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated> event is raised when each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated>denne hendelsen oppstår når hvert enkelt element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as adding content to an item.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel legge til innhold på et element.

trans-unit.source: The OnItemCreated method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnItemCreated kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen opphøye den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be rendered, each item in the control must be bound to a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen, kan gjengis, hvert element i kontrollen må være bundet til en oppføring i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object is bound to a data item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound>denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>objektet er bundet til et dataelement.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as modifying the values of the data item during the binding process.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel å endre verdiene på dataelementet under binding prosessen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.target: Metoden OnItemDataBound kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>denne hendelsen oppstår når et element Delete-knappen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>-metoden, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen lastes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Delete-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Delete".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel kontroll resultatene av sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>denne hendelsen oppstår når et element Delete-knappen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>-metoden, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen lastes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Delete-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Delete".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel avbryter sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control is not bound to a data source control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen er ikke bundet til en kilde-kontroll for data ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.target: (En Rediger-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Edit".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel avbryter redigeringsoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control is not bound to a data source control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen er ikke bundet til en kilde-kontroll for data ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> event is raised when an item's Insert button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control inserts the item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>denne hendelsen oppstår når et element Insert-knappen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A>-metoden, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen setter inn elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>

trans-unit.source: (An Insert button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as retrieving auto-generated values from the database for the inserted item.
trans-unit.target: (En Insert-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Insert".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel henter automatisk genererte verdiene fra databasen for innsatte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The OnItemInserted method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnItemInserted kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen opphøye den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It is typically used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> class.
trans-unit.target: Den brukes av kontrollutviklere når utvider <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.target: Metoden OnItemInserted kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> event when an Insert button in the control is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>-hendelse når en Insert-knapp i kontrollen klikkes eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A>-metoden, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen setter inn oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (An Insert button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as HTML-encoding or validating the values of a record before it is inserted in the data source.
trans-unit.target: (En Insert-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Insert".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel HTML-koding eller validering av verdiene i en post før den er satt inn i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The OnItemInserting method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnItemInserting kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen opphøye den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated> event is raised when an item's Update button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control updates the item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated>denne hendelsen oppstår når et element oppdateringsknappen klikkes eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A>-metoden, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen oppdaterer elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated>

trans-unit.source: (An Update button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Update".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of the update operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Oppdater-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Oppdatering".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel kontroll resultatene av oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutCreated"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object must be created to act as the container for the control.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen, kan gjengis, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>objekt må opprettes som beholder for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutCreated> event is raised when the layout template is created in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutCreated>denne hendelsen oppstår når malen oppsettet er opprettet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutCreated>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as changing the visibility of a control that is inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør det mulig å utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel endre synligheten for en kontroll som er i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>malen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.PagePropertiesChanged> event is raised when the page properties change, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control sets the new values by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.PagePropertiesChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår når egenskapene siden endrer, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen angir de nye verdiene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.PagePropertiesChanged>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine, such as a custom paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel en egendefinert Bla-operasjon når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.PagePropertiesChanging> event is raised when the page properties change, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control sets the new values by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.PagePropertiesChanging>denne hendelsen oppstår når egenskapene siden endrer, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen angir de nye verdiene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.PagePropertiesChanging>

trans-unit.target: Det gjør det mulig å utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel sletter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditIndex%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged> event is raised when an item's Select button is clicked, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår når et element Select-knappen er, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: (A Select button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Select".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as updating a status label with the currently selected item.
