trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnSelectedIndexChanging method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSelectedIndexChanging kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: There is no handler for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted> event is raised when a Sort button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted>denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en sorteringsknapp eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A>-metoden, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted>

trans-unit.source: (A Sort button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Sort".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: (Sorter-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Sorter".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnSorted method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSorted kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> event is raised when a Sort button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en sorteringsknapp eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A>-metoden, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>

trans-unit.source: (A Sort button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Sort".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: (Sorter-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Sorter".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel avbryter sorteringsoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnSorting method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSorting kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control is not bound to a data source control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen er ikke bundet til en kilde-kontroll for data ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23IPageableItemContainer%23TotalRowCountAvailable> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23IPageableItemContainer%23TotalRowCountAvailable> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23IPageableItemContainer%23TotalRowCountAvailable> event is raised when data is available for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23IPageableItemContainer%23TotalRowCountAvailable>denne hendelsen oppstår når data er tilgjengelig for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23IPageableItemContainer%23TotalRowCountAvailable>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnTotalRowCountAvailable method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnTotalRowCountAvailable kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the page properties change, after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control sets the new values.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når egenskapene siden endrer, når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen angir de nye verdiene.

trans-unit.source: The PagePropertiesChanged event is raised when the page properties change, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control sets the new values by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: PagePropertiesChanged denne hendelsen oppstår når egenskapene siden Endre, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen angir de nye verdiene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as clearing the selected item or performing a custom paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel å fjerne det valgte elementet eller en egendefinert Bla operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the page properties change, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control sets the new values.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når egenskapene siden endrer, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen angir de nye verdiene.

trans-unit.source: The PagePropertiesChanging event is raised when the page properties change, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control sets the new values by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: PagePropertiesChanging denne hendelsen oppstår når egenskapene siden Endre, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen angir de nye verdiene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SetPageProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as clearing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør det mulig å utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel sletter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditIndex%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the first record displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne indeksen for den første posten vises på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It also lets you determine the maximum number of items to display on a single page.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også finne maksimalt antall elementer som skal vises på én side.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Binds the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control to the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Binding av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen til den angitte datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The PerformDataBinding method is a helper method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to bind the control to the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PerformDataBinding er en hjelper som kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen binde kontrollen til den angitte datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface and that contains the data.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> grensesnittet og som inneholder dataene.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the associated data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter data fra den tilknyttede datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is called after data is retrieved in order to bind the data-bound control to data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.PerformDataBinding%2A>metoden etter data som hentes for å binde kontrollen databundet til data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.PerformDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Deletes all child controls in an item or group container of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Sletter alle underordnede kontroller i et objekt eller en gruppe beholderen av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to delete all child controls in an item or group container of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å slette alle underordnede kontroller i et objekt eller en gruppe beholderen av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If you have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A> template defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control, the RemoveItems method will remove all the child controls in the group container.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A>malen er definert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll, må RemoveItems metoden, fjernes alle underordnede kontroller i gruppe-beholder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will remove all the child controls in the item container.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, fjernes alle underordnede kontroller i elementbeholderen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Renders the Web server control content to the client's browser by using the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser server kontrollen webinnholdet til klientens leser ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Render method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser by using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden gjengivelse brukes til å gjengi server kontrollinnholdet til klientens leser ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The object that is used to render the server control content on the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som brukes til å vise server kontrollen innhold i klientens nettleser.

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the properties in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control that must be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer tilstanden egenskapene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen må være fast, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used to save the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control that must be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å lagre tilstanden til egenskapene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen må være fast, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den serverkontroll gjeldende visningsstatus.

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen visningsstatusen som er knyttet til kontrollen metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves the current view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer gjeldende visningsstatusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is a helper method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to save the state of the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SaveViewState er en hjelper som kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen ikke lagre tilstanden til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved view state values for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder lagrede visningsstatusen verdier for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data-key value for the selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter data for verdien for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each item in the control by using the value or values of the specified field or fields.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for hvert element i kontrollen ved hjelp av verdien eller verdiene i det angitte feltet eller felt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekter legges deretter til kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A> property is used to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A>egenskapen brukes til å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for et bestemt dataelement i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to retrieve only the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object of the currently selected item, you can use the SelectedDataKey property as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis du vil hente bare de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for det valgte elementet, kan du bruke egenskapen SelectedDataKey som en snarvei.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Using the SelectedDataKey property is the same as retrieving the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A> collection at the index that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av SelectedDataKey-egenskapen er lik henting av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objektet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A>samlingen ved indeks som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedValue%2A> property to retrieve the data-key value for the currently selected item directly.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedValue%2A>til å hente data for verdien for det valgte elementet direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object and you want to access a key field other than the first field, use the indexed SelectedDataKey property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>objektet, og du vil få tilgang til et nøkkelfelt enn det første feltet, bruker du egenskapen indeksert SelectedDataKey i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: The data key for the selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Dataene nøkkel for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that no item is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, som angir at ingen elementer for øyeblikket er valgt.

trans-unit.source: No data keys are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames*> property.
trans-unit.target: Ingen datanøkler er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedIndex property to determine the index of the currently selected item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectedIndex-egenskapen til å fastslå indeksen for det valgte elementet i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically select an item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til programmatisk Velg et element i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: (However, if you manually data-bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control, you might have to handle reading or setting this property manually as well.)
trans-unit.target: (Imidlertid Hvis du manuelt-databinding den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll, må du kanskje håndtere lesing eller angivelse av egenskapen manuelt samt.)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that no item is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er -1, som angir at ingen elementer for øyeblikket er valgt.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property is set to a value less than -1.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndex-egenskapen er satt til en verdi mindre enn -1.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item's Select button is clicked, after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et element Select-knappen er, når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndexChanged event is raised when an item's Select button is clicked, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndexChanged-hendelsen oppstår når et element Select-knappen er, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (A Select button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Select".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as updating a status label with information about the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: (Velg-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Velg".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel oppdatere statusen etikett med informasjon om det valgte elementet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item's Select button is clicked, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et element Select knappen, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndexChanging event is raised when an item's Select button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndexChanging-hendelsen oppstår når et element Select knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen behandler select-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (A Select button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Select".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the select operation.
trans-unit.target: (Velg-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Velg".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel avbryter select-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne hendelsen oppstår ikke når du angir programmatisk den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the item that was selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne indeksen for elementet som ble valgt av brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It also lets you indicate that the selection operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi at valgoperasjonen bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte valgoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egendefinerte innholdet for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedItemTemplate property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the selected item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectedItemTemplate-egenskapen til å definere en egendefinert brukergrensesnittet (UI) for det valgte elementet i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedItemTemplate is usually used to differentiate the selected item from the other displayed items.
trans-unit.target: SelectedItemTemplate brukes vanligvis til å skille det valgte elementet fra de viste elementene.

trans-unit.source: SelectedItemTemplate is rendered instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> template for the selected item.
trans-unit.target: SelectedItemTemplate gjengis i stedet for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>malen for det valgte elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the custom template declaratively, add a `SelectedItemTemplate` element inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi den egendefinerte malen deklarativt, kan du legge til en `SelectedItemTemplate` elementet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can then add the contents of the template to the `SelectedItemTemplate` element.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter legge til innholdet i malen som skal den `SelectedItemTemplate` elementet.

trans-unit.source: To display the field values of the data source that is bound to the control, use a data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise feltverdiene fra datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen, bruker du databinding uttrykk.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [databinding uttrykk oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also add buttons to the SelectedItemTemplate.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også legge til knapper i SelectedItemTemplate.

trans-unit.source: To create buttons that perform the built-in delete or edit operations, add a button control to the template and set its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property to one of the values listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette knapper som utfører innebygde delete eller redigere operasjoner, Legg til en knappekontrollen mal, og angir de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>egenskapen til en av verdiene som vises i følgende tabell.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Button type|CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |Delete|"Delete"| |Edit|"Edit"|
trans-unit.target: | Knappen typen | Verdien for kommandonavn | |-----------------|-----------------------| | Slett | " Slett "| | Rediger | " Rediger "|

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the custom content for the selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder det egendefinerte innholdet for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data-key value for the persisted selected item in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for data-nøkkelen for det valgte elementet fast i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The data key for the persisted selected item in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Data-nøkkelen for det faste valgt element i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that no item is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, som angir at ingen elementer for øyeblikket er valgt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data-key value of the selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter data for verdien for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A> property can be set to a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen kan settes til en kommadelt liste over feltnavnene som representerer primærnøkkelen for datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each item in the control by using the value or values of the specified field or fields.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen oppretter automatisk et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for hvert element i kontrollen ved hjelp av verdien eller verdiene i det angitte feltet eller felt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekter legges deretter til kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A> property is used to get the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A>egenskapen brukes til å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt for et bestemt dataelement i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to get only the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object of the currently selected item, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis du vil hente bare den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt av den valgte element, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey%2A>egenskapen som en snarvei.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: You can also directly determine the data-key value of the first key field of the selected item by using the SelectedValue property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også direkte bestemmer data nøkkel-verdien for første nøkkelfeltet i det valgte elementet ved hjelp av egenskapen SelectedValue.

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>objekt, og vil ha tilgang til et nøkkelfelt enn første felt, og bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data-key value of the selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Data-for-verdien for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Selects the item that is in edit mode in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Velger elementet er i redigeringsmodus i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item that is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for elementet er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The item index is negative.
trans-unit.target: Elementet indeksen er negativt.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified item into edit mode in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir det angitte elementet i redigeringsmodus i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItem%2A> property to access the item that is put in edit mode in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItem%2A>egenskapen til objektet som er satt inn i redigeringsmodus i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content of an edit item is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i en Rediger-elementet er definert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to set into edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for elementet som angis i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Sets the properties of a page of data in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir egenskaper for en side med data i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record on the page.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den første posten på siden.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items on a single page.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall elementer på én side.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to rebind the control after the properties are set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å binde kontrollen når egenskapene er angitt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: maximumRows is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: maximumRowser mindre enn 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- startRowIndex is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - eller - startRowIndex er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control, depending on the specified sort expression and direction.
trans-unit.target: Sorterer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontroll, avhengig av den angitte sorteringsuttrykk og retning.

trans-unit.source: Use the Sort method to programmatically sort the data that is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control by using the specified sort expression and direction.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden sortering programmatisk sortere dataene som vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen ved hjelp av angitte sorteringsuttrykk og retning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The sort expression specifies the column or columns to sort with.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsuttrykket angir kolonnen eller kolonnene du vil sortere med.

trans-unit.source: To sort multiple columns, create a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sortere flere kolonner, kan du opprette et sorteringsuttrykk som inneholder en kommadelt liste over feltnavn.

trans-unit.source: The sort direction indicates whether sorting is performed in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsretningen angir om sortering er utført i stigende eller synkende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method when you want to sort the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control from outside the control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Du vanligvis bruker denne metoden hvis du vil sortere innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollere fra utenfor kontrollen, for eksempel fra en annen kontroll på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This method is also used to programmatically set a default sort order for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control when it is first rendered.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes også til å angi en standard sorteringsrekkefølge for programmatisk i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollerer når den gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> events.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted>

trans-unit.source: The sort expression to sort the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control with.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsuttrykk sortere den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> styre med.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control is bound to a data source control, but the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the data source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til en kontroll for data-kilden, men <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objektet som er tilknyttet datakilden er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sort direction of the field or fields that are being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Henter sorteringsretningen i feltet eller feltene som er sortert.

trans-unit.source: Use the SortDirection property to determine whether the field or fields being sorted are sorted in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SortDirection-egenskapen til å fastslå om feltet eller feltene som sortert er sortert i stigende eller synkende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_SortDirection.Ascending" name="SortDirection.Ascending" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_SortDirection.Ascending" name="SortDirection.Ascending" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a sort operation is requested, after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en sorteringsoperasjonen forespørres, når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The Sorted event is raised when a Sort button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Sorted denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en sorteringsknapp eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A>-metoden, når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: (A Sort button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Sort".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: (Sorter-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Sorter".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sort expression that is associated with the field or fields that are being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Henter Sorteringsuttrykket som er knyttet til feltet eller feltene som er sortert.

trans-unit.source: When multiple columns are sorted, this property contains a comma-separated list of the fields to sort by.
trans-unit.target: Når flere kolonner er sortert, inneholder en kommadelt liste over felt å sortere etter denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The sort expression that is associated with the field or fields that are being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsuttrykket som er knyttet til feltet eller feltene som er sortert.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a sort operation is requested, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en sorteringsoperasjonen forespørres, men før den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The Sorting event is raised when a Sort button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Sorting-hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en sorteringsknapp eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A>-metoden, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: (A Sort button is a button control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to "Sort".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as customizing the sort expression.
trans-unit.target: (Sorter-knappen er en knapp kontrollere der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>er satt til "Sorter".)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> Dette lar deg utføre en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel tilpasse Sorteringsuttrykket.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the sort expression for the column.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, slik at du kan finne sorteringsuttrykk for kolonnen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It also lets you indicate that the sort operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi at sorteringsoperasjonen bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the sort operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte sorteringen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: If you try to set the TabIndex property, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.

trans-unit.source: If you get the property, it returns the default value of the corresponding property of the base class.

trans-unit.source: Updates the record at the specified index in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer oppføringen i den angitte indeksen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Use the UpdateItem method to programmatically update the record at the specified index in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk UpdateItem-metoden til å oppdatere programmatisk oppføring i den angitte indeksen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method when you want to update a record from outside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Brukes vanligvis denne metoden når du vil oppdatere en oppføring fra utenfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollere, for eksempel fra en annen kontroll på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method can be called only for an item that contains a two-way data-bound input control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden kan bare kalles bare for et element som inneholder en toveis databundet inndata kontroll.

trans-unit.source: For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om toveis binding uttrykk [Binding til databaser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).

trans-unit.source: To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi om siden valideringen utføres før oppdateringen, kan du bruke den `causesValidation` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating> events.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to update.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for elementet til å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform page validation when this method is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å utføre siden når denne metoden kalles; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: itemIndex is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: itemIndexer mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekt som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to call in order to update data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på metoden for å kalle for å oppdatere dataene.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen fører til at modellen binding som skal brukes som metoden databinding.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden.
